Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Chronic myelogenous leukemia that is refractory (does not respond to treatment).
Squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck (excluding the lip) that is locally advanced. It is used with chemoradiation.

Section.Para: The use of hydroxyurea to treat cancer is approved for the Hydrea brand. Hydroxyurea is also approved to treat sickle cell anemia. This use is approved for the Droxia brand.
Hydroxyurea is also being studied in the treatment of other conditions and types of cancer.
